WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

Running mui under .net 4 always shows a disabled scroll bar in the list layout (see attachment), the only way I was able to get rid of it was by inserting the style for ModernTab directly inside the page.

Any ideas how to fix this without having to insert a copy of the style ?

Many thanks.
WorkItem.Summary: Visible Scroll bars in List Layout

Comments.Message: Most likely related to a bug in WPF4. Make sure you add a dummy Rectangle style to your App.xaml. See also the updated tutorial [My first MUI app](https://mui.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=My%20first%20Modern%20UI%20app)
Many thanks, the dummy rectangle fixed it.
